text:
@NikkiHaley Just corporations like the cruise industry that accelerated the spread of coronavirus, right? You never asked the federal gov't for money for your state? Do you believe our own tax money shouldn't be used for us? If so, you're GOP.

Go away. Your audition for VP is embarrassing.
